settings1.title: Positioning

settings2.title: Colour Palette
settings2.desc: You can use the colour palette to change the default colours

settings3.title: Notifications
settings3.desc: If you do not want to receive chat window notifications, you can switch this off

settings4.title: Sounds
settings4.desc: You can switch this off the typing sound and other sounds

settings5.title: Spoiler Mode
settings5.desc: Tick this if you want to find all gifs as spoilers so you don't get any surprises

settings7.title: Scale Adjustment
settings7.desc: Here you can adjust the scale of the chat for yourself
